(Simplified: 鳟)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 尊 indicates the sound; 魚 (fish) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 魚 [ yú ] fish
    • 尊 [ zūn ] to honor, to respect, to venerate
①(鱒魚)體側扁，形略似鮭魚，全身有顯著的黑點。常棲海中，夏季上溯於河產卵，秋末又入海。肉可食，爲養殖的名貴魚種。
鱒魚 [ zūn yú ]: trout

鱒字的基本解释

鱒
zūn
见“鳟”。

鱒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zūn］［zùn］
［《廣韻》才本切，上混，從。］
［《廣韻》徂悶切，去慁，從。］
“鳟1”的繁体字。
(1)赤眼鳟。亦名红眼鱼。鱼纲鲤科。体延长，前部圆筒形，后部侧扁，银灰色，眼上缘红色，每鳞片后具一小黑斑，尾鳍叉形。为生活于淡水中的常见食用鱼类，可供养殖。
(2)虹鳟。鱼纲鲑科。体延长，侧扁，长约三十厘米。色鲜艳，背面和鳍暗绿色或褐色，有小黑斑，中央有一红色纵带。原产美国，后移殖于我国东北及朝鲜、日本与欧洲各国。生活在河流湖泊中。

鱒字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鱒； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1478第12
【廣韻】才本切【集韻】【韻會】粗本切，?蹲上聲。【說文】赤目魚也。【爾雅·釋魚】鮅鱒。【註】似鯶子赤眼。【疏】鮅，一名鱒。【陸璣·草木蟲魚疏】鱒似鯶魚，而鱗細於鯶，赤眼。【詩·豳風】九罭之魚，鱒魴。【傳】大魚也。又【五音集韻】士晚切，音撰。又柱兗切，音篆。義?同。又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?徂悶切，音鐏。魚名。又魚入泥。又【五音集韻】士戀切，音饌。義同。

Trout
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zūn］［zùn］
["Guangyun" is only the original cut, upmix, from. ]
["Guangyun" is boring and cut, go stunned, follow. ]
Traditional characters for "Trout 1".
(1) Red-eyed trout. Also known as red eye fish. Fish class Cyprinidae. The body is elongated, the front part is cylindrical, the back part is flat, silver-gray, the upper edge of the eye is red, with a small black spot behind each scale, and the caudal fin is forked. It is a common edible fish that lives in freshwater and can be cultivated.
(2) Rainbow trout. Fish class Salmonidae. The body is elongated, flat on the side, about thirty centimeters long. Bright color, dark green or brown on the back and fins, with small black spots, and a red vertical band in the center. It is native to the United States and later colonized in Northeast my country, North Korea, Japan and European countries. Live in rivers and lakes.
Trout
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　 Trout; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1478 Page 12
[Guang Yun] Cai Ben cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Crude Ben cut, squatting up. [Said the text] Redeye also. 【Erya·Shiyu】Grilled trout. 【Note】Like Yanzi with red eyes. [Shu] You, a trout. 【Lu Ji·Plant and Insect Fish Dispersion】Trout resembles a catfish, with thinner scales and red eyes. 【Poetry·Binfeng】The fish of Jiuzong, trout bream. [Biography] Big fish too. Also 【Pentagram Rhyme】Skilled late cut, phonetic writing. And Zhu Yan cut, sound seal. Righteous? Same. Also [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? It's dull and cut, and the sound is distressed. The name of the fish. Fish into the mud again. Also [Pentagram Rhyme] Shi loves to cut, the sound is delicacy. The same meaning.
